components.description:
A skateboard emoji, usually showing the board from the top.

Twitter's design shows the under-side of the board, as did a previous Microsoft design.

Emojipedia's sample image was modelled after Tony Hawk's skateboard.
components.title: Skateboard

description:

title: Skateboard

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the skateboard emoji is depicted with a sleek, dynamic design, featuring a smooth wooden deck with subtly rounded edges and realistic wheel textures. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading gives it a tangible feel, suggesting movement and agility. This emoji, with its energetic presentation on Apple devices, captures the spirit of urban exploration, sport, and youthful freedom.
